game.name: Kitty Haven
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Kitty Haven is a logic puzzle game about finding the purrfect spot for picky but adorable cats. Bring peace back and upgrade your kitty refuge with each new mission ! Solve puzzles and create the perfect fluffy haven.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Kitty Haven is a logic puzzle game about finding the purrfect spot for picky but adorable cats. Bring peace back and upgrade your kitty refuge with each new mission ! Solve puzzles and create the perfect fluffy haven.
